title: Penumbra: Black Plague
notes: Keyboard & mouse controls. **Decky Plugin: Some tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Some tinkering required**. Gameplay will be a black screen unless you disable Post Effects in the settings menu. Mouse & Keyboard only.
description: Surrounded by enemies and assaulted by terror from all sides, Philip must collect clues and solve vexing puzzles while combating the gnawing psychological terrors that assail his mind
